name: Tiny InoReader
description:
Tiny InoReader is a simple customized style for InoReader (https://www.inoreader.com).

Just for those who are using InoReader as RSS Reader.

Repo: https://github.com/Nonoroazoro/Tiny-InoReader
additional_info: #Changelog ###1.5 March 24th, 2016 - block ad. - adjust read area. ###1.4 March 20th, 2014 - adjust highlight area of article headers. - modify styles of some elements. ###1.3 March 16th, 2014 - adjust top padding of article content area. ###1.2 March 13th, 2014 - recode all of the styles. - release for the latest version of InoReader. ###1.1 October 22th, 2012 - adjust the space between each feed. ###1.0 March 5th, 2012 - first release of Tiny InoReader.
